# iosxr_tacacs_server (Data Source)

This data source can read the TACACS Server configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_tacacs_server" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `holddown_time` (Number) Time for which a TACACS server is marked as dead
- `hosts` (Attributes List) Specify a TACACS+ server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hosts))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ipv4_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `ipv6_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for a TACACS server to reply

<a id="nestedatt--hosts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `hosts`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) Specify a TACACS+ server
- `holddown_time` (Number) Time for which this TACACS server is marked as dead
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `ordering_index` (Number) This is used to sort the servers in the order of precedence
- `port` (Number) TCP port for TACACS+ server (default is 49)
- `single_connection` (Boolean) Reuse connection to this server for all requests
- `single_connection_idle_timeout` (Number) Idle timeout for a single-connection to the server
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for this TACACS server to reply (overrides default)
